summary: Zombie Honeymoon is a gore-soaked exploration of how far the boundaries of true love can be pushed without reaching a breaking point.
cast: Tracy Coogan|Graham Sibley|Tonya Cornelisse|David M. Wallace|Neal Jones|Maria Iadonisi|Louis Fattell|Nate Meyer|Dustin Smither|Phil Catalano|John Sobestanovich|Maria Bermudez|Steve Szymanski|Rachel Nord|Chris Chan|Mitch Goldberg|Kevin Connell|Barry Colicelli|Joe Cicalese|Sue Cicalese|Gary Cerborino|David Gebroe|Christina Reilly|John Kirby|Ray Licata
title: Zombie Honeymoon
